item.title: Machine Learning Engineer Roadmap
item.description: Mastering the Art of AI Development: A Detailed Roadmap from Data to Deployment # Introduction # Developing an effective artificial intelligence (AI) model is akin to embarking on a long, complex journey. It demands expertise in areas ranging from dataset creation and feature engineering to model tuning, evaluation, and deployment. This blog post will walk you through the key stages involved in AI development, explain the importance of each, and provide a clear understanding of the skills required at different levels of expertise, namely Junior, Senior, and Staff Engineer.
